questions.question: Is Block Blast really free to play?
questions.answer: Yes! Block Blast is completely free to play. There are no hidden costs or in-app purchases required to enjoy the full game experience.

questions.question: Do I need to download anything to play Block Blast?
questions.answer: No downloads needed! Block Blast runs directly in your web browser on any device with an internet connection.

questions.question: Can I play Block Blast on my mobile phone?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Block Blast is fully optimized for both desktop and mobile devices, providing a seamless gaming experience across all platforms.

questions.question: How do I save my progress in Block Blast?
questions.answer: Your high scores are automatically saved in your browser. For the best experience, we recommend creating a free account to track your progress across devices.

questions.question: Is Block Blast suitable for children?
questions.answer: Yes! Block Blast is family-friendly and suitable for all ages. It helps develop strategic thinking and problem-solving skills while being fun and engaging.

questions.question: How often is Block Blast updated?
questions.answer: We regularly update Block Blast with new features, challenges, and improvements based on player feedback to keep the game fresh and exciting.
